answerText: amortized analysis [do NOT accept other answers][10] Robert Tarjan introduced amortized analysis as a formal method and developed a wide array of data structures. With Daniel Sleator, Tarjan created splay trees, which are self-adjusting examples of the "search" type of these trees.
heading: PADAWAN |2014 | 1 | 8 | Science | Computer Science | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name this technique for analyzing an algorithm's runtime in which one averages over a worst-case sequence of operations. Hence, it is concerned with the actual runtime.
